website_summaries.verdict: The Galaxy S10E is a terrific value for a compact, powerhouse phone, although it can't beat the OnePlus 6T's $550 price.
pros: A dream come true for value shoppers who love small phones
The Galaxy S10E shares the S10's core camera and Snapdragon 855 chipset, so photos and speed are excellent
Battery life and wireless power sharing are also spot-on
Its fingerprint reader and flat screen solve minor problems with the pricier S10 and S10 Plus
cons: Lefties and people with small hands may find the fingerprint reader placement a tad inconvenient
The indented shape makes taking screenshots feel odd

customer_reviews.title: This is not US VERSION
customer_reviews.text: This is fake. On the description it says that it is g970u which is U S version. But it is not. It is freaking international version. Even on the box it says g970u. But if you check on device it is g970f which is not US version. I CANNOT use even samsung pay with it. I NEED TO RETURN...
customer_reviews.author: JAEMYEONG CHOI

customer_reviews.title: Software continues to get worse
customer_reviews.text: Im coming from a galaxy s5 where I rooted and deleted approx 200 apps I don't use, this is slower and has hundreds more stock apps I don't use. No one who turns off auto update wants an unremovable notification for the last system update, the arrogance of it. Samsung also doesn't allow resale via amazon, so ... don't buy something you can't resell
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 💙 Beautiful camera
customer_reviews.text: I've used Samsung Galaxy S10e for about 5 months and I'm very happy with it. I upgraded from Galaxy 7 edge to S10E and noticed a big difference. I wanted to get an iphone X, but after trying it out, I noticed that S10E has a better camera and beautiful filters.
customer_reviews.author: Doina

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung Galaxy S10e myself and needed to get my mother a new phone (she still had a flip phone). I found the S10e on Amazon that is renewed and factory unlocked. It was in excellent condition and works perfectly. We took it to our AT&T store and got a new SIM card and we were up and running. This phone is easier for her to use because I put all the items she will use on the home screen so she doesn't have to hunt through menus like she did on her flip phone. I have had Samsung Galaxy phones for years now and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Egelston

customer_reviews.title: Compact, powerful, and smooth operating.
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone 4 days ago, and love it more and more everyday. I have Verizon wireless it works no problem. The phone comes with screen protector preinstalled which is awesome. I had galaxy s7 edge, and this is a big upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: BT SJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the best phone I've ever had. The camera and fingerprint is amazing. The speaker is loud and crisp as well. The battery can last me over 8 hours but with a 3.0 charger block and cord, I can charge it to 100% in about 15 min max. Not bad. The price is a pain in the butt though. I'm still paying it off lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jarwolf

customer_reviews.title: super great performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: i copped this off of a warehouse deal for about $450 and it's the best phone i've ever had. i have not received any major lag spikes in performance. the only thing that gets annoying is the samsung software with certain notifications you cannot turn off
customer_reviews.author: dj🐦

customer_reviews.title: Received international version (without Snapdragon processor)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered us warranty version - but received international version (which does NOT have Snapdragon processor) Had to return - be careful when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: tri

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Crappy Charger
customer_reviews.text: This phone is near damn perfect. However, THE PHONE CHARGER BREAKS CONSTANTLY. I have to buy a new charger for this thing almost once every 2 months and that has never been an issue for me. That would be cool if the charger wasn't $20 a pop. Id just get a non Samsung brand one but im nervous itll damage the battery... might just do it anyway at this point cause im super pissed 😤
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of deficiencies in apps
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone except that it does not have my Verizon software icon to show me when and who I have received a voicemail from. therefore, I have to dial *86 to see who left a voicemail. Also frustrating is the notifications for apps...has this notification feature to continuously repeat sound after initial notification that cannot be turned off.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE S.

customer_reviews.title: single Sim card slot! not dual!
customer_reviews.text: Still haven't used the phone, package has arrived as described (though it seemed like it was open already). Tried to insert both of my sim cards, and realized the SD slot is too small in the width for my 2nd Sim card, that apparently is a common thing, and I have to get a dual tray online, I guess? I just don't understand why advertise the phone as supporting dual Sim, when the tray itself can't even fit two Sims...
customer_reviews.author: Iris Gorelik

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone, Make sure you can activate first.
customer_reviews.text: 3 Days from Ordered to Received. Verizon will NOT activate this phone in our area.... I got it working with an AT&T Sim. Great when we're out n about, but not here at home.
customer_reviews.author: TK Iron Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks like iPhoneX. The glass and metal texture make it a really high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Godfish

customer_reviews.title: good phone for a nice price, but....
customer_reviews.text: there are scratches on the screen. I can live with it because it's not too noticeable especially my last phone being covered with cracks, but I got it outta the box and that was the first thing I noticed. Scratches look like a puppy scratched it with its paws. If you're looking for a nice phone at a nice discount, this is the one. But I got scratches on mine, and there's a good chance you might get the same result
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hoock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This phone was unlocked as in description by the seller. It looks brand new. Works great. I ordered this for my adult son , and so happy to say he is extremely pleased with his gift . He has T-Mobile and Verizon , it works on all carriers. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Spicychic

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Samsung S10E! The camera is excellent and the phone works as advertised. I am also very pleased with the seller Endlessitems17. The phone was delivered on time and in great condition with all needed components.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Not Factory Unlocked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Chubbiestech based on the description. When I received it, however, it had the AT&T logo on the box. So I did some more research and found that it was not factory unlocked, but unlocked by AT&T. This meant it would not work with my wireless service - Republic Wireless. So I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Phone NOT unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Phone NOT unlocked. Spent 3 days, over 4 hours, and 2 new SIM cards attempting to get phone to connect to Verizon. Have emailed seller for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Phone works great
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get this phone this days and I needed it for a new medical device. Luckily this vender had this phone and it works with my carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cary

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and in great condition.
customer_reviews.text: This phone replaces a Samsung Galaxy S5 that has given me great service since 2014. In fact;, with a new battery that S5 has been given to my wife. It will handle everything she will ever need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Priebe

customer_reviews.title: Snappy, awesome camera, affordable
customer_reviews.text: Fits the hand nicely as phones have gotten so much bigger. It is nice to have a phone that is easy to handle and does not compromise on specks. Camera quality is awesome, phone is snappy with lots of internal memory; and of course expandable memory.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE INTERNATIONAL VERSION!! NOT US!!
customer_reviews.text: Has a slower and less efficient processor than the US counterpart. Not Snapdragon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone Especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone because I needed to upgrade from my iphone 6s and Obviously this is an upgrade from that phone. The fingerprint reader is the fastest I've ever seen anywhere the cameras are amazing, battery life is great. Overall I recommend this phone to everyone who doesn't already have a phone from the last year.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B

customer_reviews.title: The price of a mid-level new phone but with more options
customer_reviews.text: Like the value of get a a premium phone at a good value. A phone that seems to be good so far that should get all the latest updates for next 2 years to come. Battery life could be better. Phone was up and running within an hour of receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNY W.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've had yet
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a great price. Came in near-new condition. Very good phone with a vast amount of storage and some nice RAM. Very good camera quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: One of the best, affordable phones on the market
customer_reviews.text: This phone is an absolute steal at $400. Oh and for anyone wondering its the US version with the snapdragon processor. At least If you get it from RE-CELL. 10/10 would recommend. If you want the power of the s10 for a better price look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Bell

customer_reviews.title: jack of all traits
customer_reviews.text: small, fast, stylish, great night camera, and affordable price. Go cop ya self one if you need a new phone. It also supports 5g although we dont have 5g yet. Definitely a phone i hope that will last me until I finish college :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from my s5 and I'm loving it
customer_reviews.text: Phone is awesome, got the snapdragon version and I barely caught the sale at $550. It went back to $750 the day after I ordered so I'm glad I jumped on that. Get this phone you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: not recommend
customer_reviews.text: the phone is not worth the money. its real price should be half as much. poor camera, pictures are not clear and not bright. would gladly bring him back.
customer_reviews.author: Nastya

customer_reviews.title: Exynos model, battery will drain fast, beware
customer_reviews.text: Exynos version, beware, battery will drain in half a day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone is NOT unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, Chubbiestech has no idea what an unlocked phone is supposed to be. I ordered an unlocked device, only to find out it IS locked to the Verizon network. Don't waste your time with this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: High quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Everything is high functioning and in good quality, every accessory is in the box. Definitely the best phone I've owned yet
customer_reviews.author: ANGELIA BILLS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone for half the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It does everything the new phones do but for half the price. I have no complaints! :)
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great phone overall
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing phone, just one disadvantage is that it has exynos instead of snapdragon.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got the used like new and its perfect I love it
customer_reviews.author: abagail Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The texting feature stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, the speed, the pics. Only problem is the texting feature stopped working after 6 months. Can only text if I first send an image to the number, then I can type follow-up text. Otherwise it doesn't accept the typing in of words.
customer_reviews.author: T.L. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: NOT A U.S. model
customer_reviews.text: Like other before me said. It will not be a U.S. version. Otherwise, it's a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: jamal green

customer_reviews.title: Great phone,amazing options. Camera whow!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Have not used face thing yet. I think it's the best phone I've bought in awhile. I still am finding out great options that I didn't know it had. The camera is amazing.!!!
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone and fantastic camera. I love the smaller size than the regular S10 or S10+ because I wear it on my belt. I was NEVER going to uprgade from my Galaxy S-4 until I saw the 10e alongside the S-10. The camera Rock's.
customer_reviews.author: Don Blume

customer_reviews.title: The must have phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is outstanding period!. I have nothing but kudos to Samsung for producing a high quality phenomenal phone. Display, battery, and feel are all top notch.
customer_reviews.author: NOYB

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I've had it for a month and no issues. Usually in skeptical about not buying from the manufacturer directly.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Giver

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice display fast phone really good size for someone with smaller hands good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective device not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Screen failed only after 2 days of use. Not worth even considering. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. R.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S10e Factory Unlocked Android Cell Phone | US Version | 128GB of Storage | Fingerprint ID and Facial Recognition | Long-Lasting Battery | U.S. Warranty | Prism White
product_meta.description: The next generation Samsung Galaxy S10e is as powerful, intelligent and intuitive as you are, providing endless possibilities and next- level power in performance, productivity, creation and design. Known as the Da Vinci of smartphones, the Galaxy S10 features pro lenses to capture stunning photos and the S-Pen to easily create content and utilize your smartphone’s full capabilities. Get more from your S10 with all new creative features such as Single Take AI, Pro Video, and more. Advanced low light technology in the pro lenses gives you the ability to shoot with long exposure-style captures so your content features striking light trails. Capture video and multiple types of images with one tap of the shutter button and then easily and quickly share more, quicker. The Galaxy S10e features a powerful processor, intelligent power and a long-lasting battery that learns your habits and adapts to your screen usage in order to optimize power and performance. With Unlocked by Samsung, you get to choose the carrier, data plan, services, features and apps you want.
feature_bullets: Updated Camera Features: Get the more powerful S10e with a software update that gives you all new features including Single Take AI, Pro Video and more

High-quality camera lenses: With a full set of pro lenses, including ultrawide for stunning landscapes and micro-zoom for epic details, Galaxy S10e is a studio in your pocket, featuring live video bokeh, precision audio focus and super-stabilization
Photos and video with one tap: capture multiple images and video all at once, in one tap. Lenses, effects and filters capture the best of every moment, every time
Capture with pro-grade tool set made for masters: Control your camera settings with Pro-Video Mode to adjust the exposure, focus and more to bring your creative vision to life
Share more, quicker: The Galaxy S10e can now connect to and share with up to 5 other compatible devices at the same time using Bluetooth and WiFi, with no limits on content type or file size

Sleek Design: Samsung Galaxy S10e boasts a super-slim design that fits comfortably in your pocket and easily sits in the hand. A 5.9” infinity display with a full HD+ Dynamic AMOLED screen AMOLED screen offers a cinematic viewing experience

All-day Battery: Fast-charging, long-lasting intelligent power features super-speed processing, Wireless PowerShare, and massive storage, and tailors battery usage to how you live and work to optimize battery life to last all day

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars173 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
